content:
# The inspection of my inventory shows that I currently possess:
# - 1 Stone Furnace
# - 5 Coal
# - 3 Iron Plates
#
# Given these resources, I can craft some basic items, but I am still limited due to the lack of iron ore for further crafting. 
# However, I can utilize the stone furnace to smelt coal into fuel or create some basic structures if needed.
#
# Since I have coal and a stone furnace, I can set up a small operation to smelt more resources if I can find any nearby ores later.
#
# To maximize the use of my current resources, I will check if I can craft any useful items with the iron plates and coal I have. 
# I will also consider placing the stone furnace to prepare for future resource processing.

# First, I will check the crafting recipes available for iron plates and coal.
available_recipes = get_available_recipes()  # Get the list of available crafting recipes.
print(f"Available Recipes: {available_recipes}")  # Display the available crafting recipes.
